meanings.definition: A standish is a container for holding pens and ink.
meanings.sent1: My desk has a small standishes to keep my pens organized.
meanings.sent2: The office supply store sells various standishes for different purposes.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally knocked over the standishes, and ink spilled everywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a standishes of colorful ideas waiting to be written down.
meanings.sent5: The antique standishes on the shelf looked elegant and well-used.

meanings.definition: Standishes is the plural form of standish.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to bring their standishes to class.
meanings.sent2: The standishes on the shelves were filled with different colored inks.
meanings.sent3: The standishes lined up neatly on the desk, creating a colorful display.
meanings.sent4: In her room, standishes of various sizes were scattered around, each with a different purpose.
meanings.sent5: The standishes in the stationery shop caught her eye with their unique designs.
